title: Men's Jeans Patch Flared Trousers 70s Outfits Bell Bottom Disco Denim Pants,Vintage Patch Jeans,Used Look Flared Jeans
description: Design feature: 70s look patched jeans made from individual different denim fabric patches.
Pattern: Different sized and colored shades of blue to black create a seemingly arbitrary patchwork pattern.
Cool vintage style:With different blue to black patches and contrasting seams, here comes a new pair of patched jeans with flares in authentic boho 70s style
70s hippie look: all in the style of 70s fashion and perfect for any festival or the next 70s party
Unusual jeans flared trousers: the men's flared jeans are made of different patches and automatically turn your retro outfit into an eye-catcher
